ISSUE.TITLE: Use cookie-based TempData provider (useful in webfarm)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: "Cookie-based TempData" is the new feature supported by in ASP.NET Core 2.0 and later. It will be very useful in web farm (multiple servers) scenario, No need to rely on sticky session. There is no additional configuration needed to use the cookie TempData provider. nopCommerce mainly using TempData for notifications, selected tab, EUCookieWarning and news comment. These are not sentitive data, so we can store in cookie based TempData. Refer: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet/core/fundamentals/app-state?view=aspnetcore-2.0&tabs=aspnetcore2x#tempdata https://github.com/aspnet/Mvc/blob/dev/src/Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ViewFeatures/ViewFeatures/CookieTempDataProvider.cs
